[File: aptos-core/crates/transaction-generator-lib/src/entry_points.rs] [Function: pick_random()] [Integer Underflow] In the loop at line 52 where picked -= *weight, can picked underflow if weight values are manipulated, causing incorrect index selection or infinite loops? (Medium)

[File: aptos-core/crates/transaction-generator-lib/src/entry_points.rs] [Function: pick_random()] [Off-by-One Error] Does the comparison picked < *weight at line 49 correctly handle edge cases where picked == weight - 1, potentially causing biased selection toward early entries? (Low)
